keyword: how many calories in a white claw
title: How Many Calories in a White Claw?

h1: How Many Calories in a White Claw?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of White Claw hard seltzer, any flavor (calories consistent); 5% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and serving size. Always check the product label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard White Claw has 100 calories, 2 g carbs, and 0 g fat or protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

No added sugars; 0 g total sugars per can.
